text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Lotta ta ta... Lovin! Lovin! Lotta ta ta...<n>Wh-whoa!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Aw man, still can't get it. Something<n>about the rhythm in this
part...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Is she... dancing in the park?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer. No, no, this isn't for a<n>concert.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
This is for my number one hobby,<n>arcade dance games!
They're super<n>fun!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
In races, it's always about whoever<n>runs the fastest, right?
But dance<n>games are a bit different.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Finishing the "race" is important too,<n>but what's just as
important is doing<n>it in style! You gotta look cool and<n>cute,
and fa☆bu☆lous!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
It's the best feeling ever, and the<n>most fun! No other type of
game can<n>compete!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Or at least, that's how I used to feel.Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I set a high score the other day,<n>but now a new
rival's appeared and<n>beaten it already.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: My score was 620,000. And theirscore was 999,999! They actuallyhit the score ceiling!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I wanna get my record back so, so<n>bad—prove that I'm just
as good! So,<n>that's why I'm practicing.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
And I've done just about everything<n>I can! Trainer, let's hit
up the arcade<n>together!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Showdown time! I can do this! Iabsolutely can do this. Wecan make it happen! All right, let's getthis game started!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Whoa, a new personal best! But still<n>so far off... Trainer...
choice_data_list: You can do it! Keep going!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Th-thanks... You're right. I can't give<n>up after just one try.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to be the invincible Teio! I<n>can be lighter, faster!
Try number two,<n>here we go!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Another huge personal best! But still<n>not enough... Nnngh,
how am I<n>supposed to get any higher?

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: You can do it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Uh, hi...?

text_block_list.name: Mother
text_block_list.text:
She's been watching this whole time.<n>Can't stop gushing
about how good<n>you are.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: R-really? Hey, you having fun<n>watching me dance?

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text: Yeah, lots of fun! But...

text_block_list.name: Girl
text_block_list.text:
Sometimes you look like it really<n>hurts, and then I start to
feel like it<n>hurts too...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Like it hurts? Oh, I never realized I<n>was making that face...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Dance games are meant to be fun. So<n>if I don't look like I'm
having fun, of<n>course I won't get a perfect score.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It does hurt to fail, but that's noexcuse not to smile! It'll help me staycalm and loosen up! Isn't that right, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Will do! I'll try again. And again, and<n>again! If I can keep a
smile on my lips,<n>I'll be at the top before I know it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: All right, let's go! Don't forget to<n>cheer me on!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so Teio resumes her endless<n>challenge, now with a
crowd rooting<n>for her.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... There goes mysmile... But I'm not done yet!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: We're in the 900,000's! Almost<n>there!

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Teio! Teio!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, you guys... But I might be at<n>my limit... I don't know
if I can move<n>anymore... But even so…

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Teio! Teio!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Their cheers... give my legs strength!<n>C'mon, focus... Last
one!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? The music stopped... I... I did it...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I did it! A perfect score! Trainer, you<n>guys, I did it!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah... For a sec there I was about<n>ready to call it quits. But
then...

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You all gave me strength. You made<n>the invincible Teio more
than<n>invincible!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! And it's not just the score that<n>counts—I finished with
a smile! I bet<n>that's why the crowd got so fired up.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. Now our scores are tied, but Idefinitely beat my rival with stylepoints!

text_block_list.name: Arcade Worker
text_block_list.text: Hm? Ah! That machine!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? An employee... Is something the<n>matter?

text_block_list.name: Arcade Worker
text_block_list.text:
My bad, my bad. I forgot to reset that<n>machine. It was just
in maintenance<n>mode, you see.

text_block_list.name: Arcade Worker
text_block_list.text: The top score was still set to the max.<n>I'll fix it right now.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You whaaat?! Wait, so this isn't<n>actually someone's score?
It's just<n>from maintenance?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha! That was a good laugh. Can't<n>believe I got so
worked up over an<n>imaginary rival.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: A bit, but it helped me realize<n>something, I think. See…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Cheers aren't just cheers, they'repower. I'm always invincible andincredible, but with that power, I wasable to be twice, no, ten times asincredible!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
That was just practice! Next time, I'll<n>do it on the track. It'll
be the most<n>exciting win ever, and it'll be thanks<n>to the
crowd's cheers!
